title: new-article

content:
Education#Universidad de Alcalá — B.Sc. Information Systems Engineering2020 — 2025Core CS & software engineering: programming, systems, networks, databases, project management. Python, C++, TCP/IP, PostgreSQL, PowerBI, Linux, Matlab.Silesian University of Technology (Gliwice, Poland) — Erasmus+ KA131Sep 2023 — Jul 2024Exchange year taking master-level data science courses (IoT Security, Data Analysis, Data Mining, Artificial Intelligence). Developed an international mindset and academic fluency in English. LoRaWAN, RapidMiner, AI, Data Mining, Statistical Learning, Java, Neural Networks.Experience#Universidad de Alcalá — Research Intern (Eurobot 2025)Mar 2025 — Jul 2025 · Alcalá de HenaresContributed to Eurobot Spain 2025 with solutions including:
SBC integration (Raspberry Pi) and hardware setup Web feature development for the project site Web scraping pipelines for OSINT data collection and processing AI models for YouTube speech-to-text and content analysis El Corte Inglés — Retail AssistantNov 2019 — Apr 2021 · Alcalá de HenaresMy main tasks were:
Customer service focused on improving the customer experience and resolving incidents at the checkout. Product restocking and stock control. Teamwork in a dynamic and busy environment, adapting to different roles as needed. Development of communication, problem-solving, and time management skills. Certifications#Cyber Intelligence & Digital SkillsSince Jul 2025UAH — Microcredential in Cyberintelligence (Jul 2025) — Training focused on the full threat intelligence cycle, structured APT analysis, and actionable intelligence. Practical use of MITRE ATT&CK, STIX, MISP, OpenCTI and Maltego. EUGLOH — Living Lab: Digital and Informational Skills (Jul 2025) — International collaboration in cybersecurity, data science, and digital skills. GDPR, AI, ML. Security & PentestingSince Jun 2023eLearnSecurity — eJPTv2 (Junior Penetration Tester) (Jun 2023) — Hands-on red-team fundamentals: Nmap, Metasploit, Hydra, networking. HardwareHacking.es — Hardware Hacking Bootcamp (Apr 2025) — Soldering, PCB design, hardware implants, reverse engineering, DMA attacks. Data & Machine LearningSince Jul 2022RapidMiner — Data Engineering Professional (Oct 2023) — Data engineering workflows and best practices. Kaggle — Intro to Machine Learning (Jul 2022) — Core algorithms and hands-on practice. Kaggle — Python Course (Jul 2022) — Python fundamentals. NVIDIA — Jetson Nano Grant (Dec 2021) — AI-focused SBC grant. LanguagesSince Dec 2022British Council — Aptis ESOL (CEFR C) (Dec 2022) — English proficiency. Conferences & Workshops#Conferences & WorkshopsSince Jul 2022AccessibleEU — Accessible ICT (Poland) (Dec 2023) — Accessible digital content & mobile apps; accessible docs and UI design. Policía Nacional — C1b3rwall (Jun 2023) — OSINT, incident response, threat intelligence. Osintomático — OSINT Conference (May 2023) — Open-source intelligence techniques and tools. RootedCON — Cybersecurity Conference (Mar 2023) — Offensive & defensive security, cyberintelligence, emerging threats. Ginseg — IntelCon (Jul 2022) — Intelligence & cybersecurity conference.
title: Resume

content:
I’m an Information Systems Engineer (still missing one last subject) at Universidad de Alcalá with a strong interest in cybersecurity.
Here, you can see my resume and posts.
My goal right now is to continue growing as an engineer while deepening my expertise in cybersecurity.
I aim to develop myself both technically and personally, contributing to innovative projects with curiosity, creativity, and willingness to learn.
Visit my LinkedIn
